name: Sofi
description:
Can you guide Sofi through the coloured rings?

Rotate, spin, and even cross your arms to match the colours, but watch out for electric barriers!

A simple concept yet challenging to master. This attractive game mesmerizes and puts you into an almost zen-like state at higher levels.

Includes 3 full game modes:

+ Challenge
See how long you can survive through increasingly fiendish levels.

+ Constellation
Crack 19 hand-designed levels to reveal the constellations.

+Infinity
The game that never ends. Game difficulty automatically adjusts to your skill level. This is the mode you can pick up and play for 1 minute while waiting for a bus.
